issue.title: [CF 728] Help with mangle/shred button
issue.body:
For feral druid:  I'm afraid this one has stumped me so looking for a little help. Mangle is my "1" hotkey button and I swap it with Shred in groups. I tried to break the habit but it works best for me. Occasionally I forget to put shred in my "1" key slot in groups/raids which is a huge dps loss.

What I want is a TMW icon to tell me when I have used Mangle but only if  I am grouped or in a raid (don't want the warning when solo). Mangle is still used in raids based on position so I don't need anything overly loud, but just a slight couple second warning when the Mangle action is used to warn me to check that I meant to use it and not Shred.

Thanks so much.

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
6.11


> Posted by CurseForge user Maven79 | Imported from CurseForge issue #728 | Raw
